objective: Dynamic and highly skilled Software Engineer with a strong proficiency in JavaScript, Vue.js, Linux, Docker, Golang, and Python. With a proven track record of delivering robust and scalable software solutions, I am seeking a challenging role where I can leverage my expertise to drive innovation and contribute to the success of impactful projects.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

responsibilities: Designed and developed responsive front-end components for web applications using JavaScript, Vue.js, HTML, and CSS, ensuring a seamless user experience across different platforms.
Implemented RESTful APIs and microservices architectures using Golang and Python, facilitating efficient communication between front-end interfaces and back-end services.
Utilized Docker for containerization of applications, optimizing deployment processes, and ensuring consistency in development and production environments.
Collaborated with DevOps team to implement CI/CD pipelines and automate build, test, and deployment processes, improving development efficiency and time-to-market.
Conducted code reviews, mentored junior developers, and provided technical guidance to ensure code quality, maintainability, and adherence to best practices.
Participated in Agile ceremonies including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospective meetings, contributing to the continuous improvement of team processes and performance.
Contributed to the optimization of application performance through code refactoring, performance tuning, and scalability improvements.
Worked closely with stakeholders to gather requirements, define project scope, and deliver high-quality software solutions that meet business objectives.

projects.name: Project Name
projects.description: Developed a scalable microservices architecture using Golang and Docker, enabling seamless deployment and horizontal scaling of services.

projects.name: Project Name
projects.description: Built a real-time web application using Vue.js and WebSocket for live data visualization and monitoring.
